title: Roommate
description:
Hello! I am Looking for two friendly roommates to fill 2 spacious bedrooms in a modern row home in Fishtown (LGBTQIA+ & BIPOC friendly). I’m hoping to find working professional/graduate level students or higher who are interested in sharing a spacious, well-cared for and welcoming home, and would be open to hosting the occasional rooftop gathering.  All gender identities welcome!  Roommates must be fully COVID vaccinated.
About the Area:
1438 Germantown Ave is a modern row home that is less than a 15-minute walk from the Girard Station El Station in Fishtown. The house features a large rooftop deck with beautiful views of the Philadelphia skyline and is a short commute (20-minute walk) to Temple’s main campus. Additionally, the home’s close proximity to city bus stops and The El makes it easy to access Center City. Fishtown is a young and vibrant area that is constantly evolving. There are plenty of excellent restaurants and bars that make it an ideal for people looking to explore a different side of Philly.
About the House:
There are two large bedrooms available for rent starting June 1st (move-in date potentially flexible depending on circumstances). One room is slightly larger and has three windows ($1,050), while the second room has two windows ($1,000). Both include large closets, plenty of natural light and are on opposite sides of the house (extra privacy). There is also an extra guest bedroom in the basement. Note: My current roommate is looking to sell extra pieces of furniture before he moves out (drawers, bed, closet, bed frame etc.).
About Me:
I am a 28-year-old social worker originally from the Philly-area looking for two roommates who are excited to share this great house.  I work with children and families and am pursuing my full licensure to eventually run my own private practice but currently I work at a partial program. After work, I enjoy unwinding with a book, dabbling on the guitar, going to the gym, and making use of my instapot (unless their is a good happy hour at the corner brewery). Over the weekends I like to watch whatever game is on with some friends, play games and enjoy the rooftop on nice days as well as advantage of the local bar and restaurant scene (feel free to come with!). I hope any new roommates would enjoy spending some time together and will make good use of the space, while also taking care of it.
Other features include:
- In-unit washer & dryer
- Large guest room with a private bathroom on the ground floor
- Private rooftop deck with a grill, furniture and view of the skyline
- Central A/C and gas heat
- Spacious modern kitchen with a gas stove and dishwasher
- Large common areas with plenty of natural light
- Access to a driveway (potential off-street parking option)
- 5-15 minute walk to breweries, restaurants, gyms, coffee shops (ReAnimator Coffee/ La Colombe), Acme, urgent care facilities and more!
- Under a mile away from Planet Fitness
- Unfortunately, no pets are allowed by the landlord :(
If you’re interested in learning more about the house/myself, please feel free to DM me and we can set up a time to chat. In your message, tell me a little about yourself including:
How do you spend your free time?
What do you do for a living?
Do you smoke?
Desired move in date.
Are you vaccinated for the covid?

title: Updated, open, stylish 3br 2b   Kitchen and all new light fixtures
description:
Updated, open, stylish 3br 2b Cape Cod on a landscaped lot in a convenient location near everything North. Flexible, comfortable, roomy floor plan. Recent roof on main house and entirely new roof on oversized garage w/openers and side door. Gas systems, salutary hot water heat and 2 zoned air conditioning with upper floor on remotes. Entry Porch/Sunroom w/new carpet tiles. Large Living Room with wood burning fireplace and separate but open Dining Room. Beautiful renovated Kitchen opens to Family Room and has new stainless deep sink and faucet, stove, dishwasher, refrigerator and microwave. New leather granite counters. Pantry closet with pullout shelves. Lots of recessed lighting in Kitchen and all new light fixtures, many with dimmers, in the entire house, except basement, although the seller recalls there may be a few ungrounded outlets. 2 doors from Kitchen to handsome terrace and side entrance to garage. First floor bedroom and first floor bath with deep entry closet. Upstairs, 2 more bedrooms and another full bath. Both tubs have been reglazed plus there are new vanities, shower heads and new white tile in the 2nd floor Bath.  Entire interior of house, including closets, has been freshly painted. Oak hardwood floors throughout except for ceramic tile in kitchen and baths.  Huge basement was also recently painted, has outside entrance, french drain system and is said to be rough plumbed for a powder room (believed accurate but should be verified by interested party). Laundry room has new taps for washer/dryer and new shutoff valves. LOTS of storage space and an extra refrigerator in basement and many doubled closets (some mirrored) and storage throughout the home. Off street parking for 3-4 cars in addition to garage.

title: The updated kitchen is equipped with Carrera marble countertops
description:
The epitome of loft-living awaits at the famed White Building. Ideally situated off Washington Square West, this iconic condominium boasts some of the most unique and spacious floor plans that perfectly capture the essence of the historical and artistically rich neighborhood. Constructed in the late 1800 s and converted to a condominium in 2006, unit 302 showcases the remnants of the buildings historical roots with over 15-foot barrel vaulted ceilings, exposed brick, steel beams, and large arched windows. The open and flexible floor plan allows for an inviting layout, ideal for entertaining. The updated kitchen is equipped with Carrera marble countertops and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances; including an induction stovetop, built-in microwave, and Sub-Zero refrigerator. Oversized windows line the walls of the master bedroom and living areas; revealing bright, western exposures of the Beneficial Savings Fund Society Building. The master bedroom suite is very spacious with a large walk-in closet and spa-like bathroom. A bonus loft space is up the custom-built staircase and can be used as a den, home office or 2nd bedroom. The current owner has added technological features which include a Lutron Caseta lighting system, Nest thermostat, and electric blinds all controllable by an automated home system. 105 S 12th Street is a boutique condo with a newly equipped intercom system, fitness center, and storage rooms. Available furnished or semi furnished as well, inquire within.

title: a premier apartment community located in the popular place
description:
Welcome to The Residences at The Block, a premier apartment community located in the popular Northern Liberties neighborhood. This 1BR Bi-level includes a small room (office space) once you enter. Finishes include modern stainless steel appliances, contemporary two-tone kitchen cabinets, clean white solid surface countertops, textured white backsplash, hickory wood flooring, stone texture tile in bathrooms, sleek black fixtures in the bathroom. The Deck is a vibrant social space that has brightly colored flexible seating for gatherings & activities, gravel gardens with cozy fire pits, lush raised planting beds, a dog park with an outdoor shower, and the best part expansive views of Center City skyline. The Commons is a warm and inviting front lobby which includes a communal fireplace and cozy lounge for late-night conversations. The Block is built on a foundation of convenience with easy access to countless amenities in SoNo. Located in the heart of Northern Liberties, a vibrant neighborhood bustling with community activities, arts, entertainment, restaurants, and businesses of all kinds. Aside from the Yards Brewery, NoLibs is home to a variety of restaurants and bars including the Silk City, North 3rd, Honey's Sit-n-Eat, and Cafe La Maude. Target is just across the street. In regards to transportation, the Market Frankford El and several bus routes are close by, giving you an easy commute to Center City. Neighborhoods like Fishtown and Old City are only a few blocks away with even more options. Enjoy all this vibrant neighborhood has to offer!

title: Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartment Home, Lounge, Gym, Sauna, Near Shopping
description:
The home at 2315 is a 575 square foot one bedroom one bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. The bathroom is also renovated. This home features neutral carpet to go with any decor well. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Most of the large windows face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One of the windows in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a view of the park. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table from Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
*  24/7 top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 On-site Maintenance
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Large closets
* Large windows
* Carpet
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Call Jocelyn  show contact info
x122 or Michelle at  show contact info
x129 to schedule an appointment to tour. Please note that an appointment is required to tour at this time. Live virtual tours on FaceTime and in Zoom available!

201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103

title: The updated kitchen is equipped with Carrera marble countertops
description:
The epitome of loft-living awaits at the famed White Building. Ideally situated off Washington Square West, this iconic condominium boasts some of the most unique and spacious floor plans that perfectly capture the essence of the historical and artistically rich neighborhood. Constructed in the late 1800 s and converted to a condominium in 2006, unit 302 showcases the remnants of the buildings historical roots with over 15-foot barrel vaulted ceilings, exposed brick, steel beams, and large arched windows. The open and flexible floor plan allows for an inviting layout, ideal for entertaining. The updated kitchen is equipped with Carrera marble countertops and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances; including an induction stovetop, built-in microwave, and Sub-Zero refrigerator. Oversized windows line the walls of the master bedroom and living areas; revealing bright, western exposures of the Beneficial Savings Fund Society Building. The master bedroom suite is very spacious with a large walk-in closet and spa-like bathroom. A bonus loft space is up the custom-built staircase and can be used as a den, home office or 2nd bedroom. The current owner has added technological features which include a Lutron Caseta lighting system, Nest thermostat, and electric blinds all controllable by an automated home system. 105 S 12th Street is a boutique condo with a newly equipped intercom system, fitness center, and storage rooms. Available furnished or semi furnished as well, inquire within.

title: Practical & stylish 1 bed 1 ba apt in the desirable Art Museum area!
description:
2232 Green St #1F – Available for rent July 1
Quite possibly the best block in Philadelphia. Located just off Pennsylvania Ave at the foot of the Philadelphia Museum of Art this location has it all. Very scenic with conveniences everywhere. Walk to Whole Foods, convenience stores, the pharmacy, or one of the many bars and restaurants that Fairmount Ave has to offer. Stroll on down to Kelly Drive for a run around the loop. Watch the rowers go up and down the Schuylkill River, the skateboarders at Paine Park, or the fireworks above the Art Museum on the 4 of July.
